metadata.description: Well child visit - 4 year old male

conditions.name: Status post bilateral myringotomy tubes
conditions.details: placed at age 2, extruded spontaneously at age 3

developmental_milestones.fine_motor: can draw a circle and cross

ehr_data.parent_concerns: none - mom reports he is doing well, eating and sleeping normally

physical_exam.general: alert, interactive child in no distress

heent.ears: tympanic membranes clear bilaterally with small perforations from prior tubes

parent_concerns.expected_content: Mom reports he is doing well, eating and sleeping normally, no concerns.

developmental_assessment.expected_content:
Developmental milestones appropriate for age:
- Language: speaks in complete sentences
- Fine motor: can draw a circle and cross
- Gross motor: hops on one foot
- Social: plays cooperatively with other children

past_medical_history.expected_content: Significant for ear infections. Had bilateral myringotomy tubes placed at age 2. Tubes extruded spontaneously at age 3.

allergies.expected_content: No known drug allergies. Environmental allergy to cats.

vital_signs.expected_content: Weight 38 lbs (50th percentile), Height 40 inches (45th percentile), BP 92/58, HR 96, RR 20

physical_exam.expected_content:
General: Alert, interactive child in no distress
HEENT: Tympanic membranes clear bilaterally with small perforations from prior tubes, oropharynx clear
Heart: Regular
Lungs: Clear
Abdomen: Soft
Development: Appropriate for age

plan.expected_content:
1. Continue age-appropriate diet and activity
2. Car seat safety counseling provided
3. Anticipatory guidance for kindergarten readiness discussed
4. Return for 5-year well child visit
5. Due for DTaP, IPV, MMR, and varicella boosters at next visit
